animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love to eat peanuts. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love peanuts.
🐘 I'm the largest land animal.
💧 I can use my trunk to spray water.

animal.question: I say 'meow' and love to chase mice. I also purr when I'm happy. Who am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I love to play with yarn.
🥛 I like to drink milk.
🐈 I have whiskers.

animal.question: I go 'woof woof' and love to play fetch. I'm a loyal friend. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love bones.
🎾 I love to chase balls.
🐕 I wag my tail when I'm happy.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦒 My spots help me camouflage.
🌿 I am the tallest mammal.
🌍 I live in Africa.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and graze on the African savanna. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦓 No two of us have the exact same stripes.
🐎 I look like a horse.
🦁 I am often prey for lions.

animal.question: I waddle and quack, and I love to swim in ponds. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I have webbed feet.
🥚 I lay eggs.
🌾 I eat seeds and plants.

animal.question: I roar loudly and am known as the king of the jungle. Who am I?

hints.text: 👑 I have a mane.
🐾 I am a big cat.
🥩 I eat meat.

animal.question: I hop around and have a pouch for my babies. I live in Australia. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦘 I am a marsupial.
🌱 I eat plants.
🇦🇺 I am a national symbol of Australia.

animal.question: I'm a reptile with a hard shell and can live for a very long time. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I move very slowly.
🥬 I like to eat lettuce.
🏝️ I can live on land or in the sea.

animal.question: I am a bird of prey known for my sharp talons and excellent eyesight. I soar high in the sky. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦅 I am a symbol of freedom in some countries.
🏔️ I often nest on cliffs.
🐟 I hunt for fish and other animals.

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and colorful petals. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I often grow in gardens.
💐 People give me as gifts.
☀️ I need sunshine and water to grow.

plant.question: I am tall and have a trunk. Birds like to build nests in my branches. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I provide shade on a sunny day.
🐿️ Squirrels love to climb me.
🍁 My leaves change color in the fall (autumn).

plant.question: I am a long orange vegetable that rabbits love to eat. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am crunchy when you bite me.
🥗 I can be eaten raw or cooked.
🏡 I grow in the ground.

plant.question: I have prickly thorns and beautiful flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🥀 I am often given as a symbol of love.
🌹 I come in many different colors.
🖐️ Be careful when handling me, or you might get pricked!

plant.question: I am a seed that pops when heated. People love to eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I come from a plant with yellow kernels.
🍿 I taste good with butter and salt.
🔥 I need heat to transform.

plant.question: I am a green plant with a strong smell. People use me to flavor food. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I can be dried or used fresh.
🍕 I often go on pizza or pasta sauce.
🇮🇹 I am very popular in Italian cooking.

plant.question: I am a type of plant that grows along the ground or up walls. I often produce juicy fruits. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I am often found in vineyards.
🧱 I can climb walls.
🪴 I am not a tree and not a shrub.

plant.question: I am a seed that is used to make bread. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I am grown in large fields.
🍞 I am ground into flour.
☀️ I need lots of sun to grow.

plant.question: I am a flower that follows the sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I am very tall and yellow.
🛢️ My seeds can be used to make oil.
🧭 I always face the sun.

plant.question: I am a plant with a thick stem that stores water, and I often live in dry places. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I am often found in the desert.
🏜️ I have spines instead of leaves.
💧 I can survive with very little water.
